description: A recent change shadowed the existing VMOpsTestCase class with a new one that tested only one aspect of behavior, in the nova/tests/virt/xenapi/test_vmops.py test file.
title: VMOpsTestCase shadowed

comments.content: A recent change shadowed the existing VMOpsTestCase class with a new one that tested only one aspect of behavior, in the nova/tests/virt/xenapi/test_vmops.py test file.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~klmitch

comments.content: Odd; I created a review that fixes this bug, but even though I linked  to the bug properly, it doesn't seem the bug report has been updated.  For reference, this bug is fixed by https://review.openstack.org/#/c/39381/, which has been merged to trunk.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~klmitch
